channel.title: Comments on: Flight of the Conchords “Business Time” live

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: Flight of the Conchords has been renewed for a second season! Weeeeee!
item.content:encoded: Flight of the Conchords has been renewed for a second season! Weeeeee!

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: "The humans are dead...Affirmative, I poked one; it was dead." God, what a great show.
item.content:encoded:
“The humans are dead…Affirmative, I poked one; it was dead.”
God, what a great show.

item.title: By: k
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: The most recent episode is <a href="http://www.hbo.com/conchords/video/index.html" rel="nofollow">available for free</a> on the HBO site and the first one is available at the iTunes store (for free).
item.content:encoded: The most recent episode is available for free on the HBO site and the first one is available at the iTunes store (for free).
